title: The Australian National University
creator_credit: John Morris, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Surveys the teaching and research facilities of the Australian National University. Shows examples of investigations being pursued in microbiology, botany, geophysics, English, law, archaeology, Indonesian, literature, zoology, demography, astronomy, and political science. Photography: Tom Cowan; Music: Moneta Eagles.
